name: Closed Room
description:
FREE classic escape game! --- CLOSED ROOM ---

While walking along a strange street, you find a mysterious poster with CLOSED ROOM written on it. Upon entering, you are unexpectedly trapped in this mysterious room. To find the way out, you must solve all the mind-bending puzzles in the enclosed area. There are also many useful items hidden in the room. Be sure to search every nook and cranny!

If you get stuck, you can purchase a PERFECT STRATEGY GUIDE that will tell you exactly how to get through puzzles you will encounter in the game. Or you can opt for a HINT GUIDE which will provide you with very help instructions for the game’s puzzles, without giving you the complete answer. Pick the choice that best fits your play style and desire for challenge.

Available in English and Japanese.
